text: With resistance mutations emerging in CVB3 2A and 3C proteases , we next hypothesized that these mutations may enhance viral replication in polyamine - depleted cells by maintaining proteolytic activity . To test this , we generated mutant 2A 29K and 3C 52R proteases through site - directed mutagenesis of our overexpression vectors . We then cotransfected these proteases and the wildtype
